newsitem.title: BELGIUM: Gen.Bank to buy 34 pct of French securities house.
newsitem.headline: Gen.Bank to buy 34 pct of French securities house.

text.p: Belgium's Generale Bank said on Thursday it had concluded an agreement with the shareholders of French securities house Meeschaert-Rousselle to acquire a 34 percent stake in the company.
It gave no financial details of the deal.

In a statement, Generale Bank said the remaining shares of Meeschaert-Rousselle would stay in the hands of the French company's staff, and that the deal was subject to the approval of the relevant authorities.

"This acquisition is in line with Generale Bank's strategy of expanding its core businesses, which include financial markets. It will contribute to consolidating Generale Bank's presence on the equities markets in the countries surrounding Belgium," the statement said.
Generale Bank has a Belgian securities house, G-Securities, and one in the Netherlands, Oyens & Van Eeghem.
